text.data: The rain ended...[end].
....Celine...[end]I
I have defeated Lestat.[end]A
And now, you... and the people of Mahal...[end]W
Will you forgive me?[end]C
Celine...[end]M
My love...[end]C
C-Celine?![end]Y
Your promise to me...[end]Y
You kept your word...[end]T
Thank you, darling.[end]T
Tee hee, we... Long ago, the two of us came here often, didn't we. To come see the rainbows.[end]D
Do you remember?[end]Y
You were always angry when the rainbows wouldn't appear... You would say, [0x24]The rainbows will not appear! They will not![0x22][end]B
But, you made me happy. Our happy memory... Hee hee...[end]R
Right, darling?[end]Y
You've become a spectacular knight...[end][character][0x1]
[character][0x1] and Matelite of Kahna are also strong, and nice...[end]B
But to me... you're the best. Hee hee...[end]I
I kept it a secret, but when Mahal was attacked...[end]T
There was a child inside me.[end]I
I'm sorry I didn't tell you.[end]A
At the time, it seemed like your head was full of things about the war with the Empire...[end]I
I didn't want to worry you unnecessarily.[end]I
I really wanted to tell you... I wanted you to hear me...[end]B
But you were always worrying about Mahal...[end]T
That's why I didn't say anything.[end]I
I had decided on a name. If it was a boy, Shogun. If it was a girl, Chiko.[end]R
Rainbows...?![end]I
It's the rainbows, darling![end]H

How I wanted to see them with you when I was still alive... These rainbows...
And then my wish would have been granted...[end]T

The people who see these rainbows...
Do you remember the story that whoever sees them will have their wishes come true?[end]M
My wish now is... that the people of the world live in peace! In a world without battles and wars![end]I
I wish for that...[end]R
Right? Darling...[end]C
Celine! Your wish... I will make it come true![end][end]
